Text:
Fuck you and your scene-stealing 1990s-reminiscent RAR'd releases.
This isn't fucking usenet, open your eyes and unrar this shit before you seed it so all can verify.
No thanks from me.

@aparadox Sceneline is trusted. RAR's make it smaller. Don't like it? Buy the DVD 12 months after the TV show. 

Excellent release as always, kudos to you :)
now I`ve heard that too... Vids stopped getting smaller by compression by the time divx and mp3 arrived lol :P
Yes a bit inconvinient with RARS, but you should still thank the nice man for delivering a brand new episode in HD, for free. Thank you sceneline !
